channel.title: Processing on Greg Zborovsky
channel.description: Recent content in Processing on Greg Zborovsky

item.title: Simple Platformer
item.description: Intro Back in high school, for an AP CS final project, I decided to make a platformer where you can tell the character to jump by yelling. As a learning experience, I chose to write it in Processing, a piece of software that advertises itself as “a flexible software sketchbook” and separate language, but is actually a library for Java which makes it very easy to work with graphics, audio, and user input.
